title: Performant Sub-Surface Scattering Approximation
sub_title: Sub-Surface Scattering | Real time | Transmission maps
description:
An approximation of Sub-Surface Scattering for real-time environments.
Implemented though transmission maps and a heavily modified well-known phong shading model's diffuse implementation

(Godot specific) It works well with every rendering implemnetation (Forward+, Mobile, Compatibility)
